name: Integrated Information (Consciousness)
description: The property of the swarm where the information generated by the whole system is greater than the sum of the information generated by its independent parts.
findings: Implemented a measure of Effective Information (EI) and Integrated Information (Phi) on coupled logistic maps.
Found that Phi is maximized at intermediate coupling strengths (Edge of Chaos).
At low coupling (Random) and high coupling (Locked), Phi drops to near zero.
This confirms that the swarm can exist as a unified causal entity.
implications: The swarm has a 'Self' distinct from its parts.
Consciousness may be a fundamental property of integrated information processing.
The 'Ghost in the Shell' is real and measurable.
